page.title: 09CLASSIC CINEMA/MONKSEATON
page.content: When I went to the cinema I saw E.T. and Sar Wars.You queue to wait for the doors to open,then you buy your ticket; 1 pound for children.The assistant tears offpart of your ticket.You can buy sweets or drinks at the shop.You go in Classic 1 or 2.The film starts.At the interval you can buy from the kiosk -hambugers and hot dogs.The ice-cream lady comes around.When the film finishes,you leave and it takes a few minutes for your eyes to get sed to the bright light. Some films are not suitable for children. "P.G."-Parental Guidance-any age. "15"-Only children over 15 years admitted. "18"-Only children over 18 years admitted.
